article_title: Round O man, 21, identified as victim in fatal Hollywood crash
article_text:
A driver who died in a single-vehicle crash near Hollywood was identified Sunday as a 21-year-old man.

Trevor Morphet of Round O in Colleton County died at the scene around 7:15 a.m. Saturday, Deputy Charleston County Coroner Kelly Kraus said.

Morphet was northbound on County Line Road in a Chevrolet S-10 when the pickup crossed the southbound lane and hit a tree near the Davison Road intersection, according to the Charleston County Sheriff’s Office. He was not wearing a seat belt, deputies added.

Reach Andrew Knapp at 937-5414 or twitter.com/offlede.
